Verses: 1 appadiyaanaal, Nammudaiya Thagappanaagiya Aabiragaam Maamsaththinpadi Ennaththaik Kandadaindhaan Endru Solluvom?
2 aabiragaam Kiriyaigalinaale Needhimaanaakkappattaanaagil Menmaipaaraatta Avanukku Edhuvundu; Aagilum Dhevanukku Munbaaga Menmaipaaraatta Edhuvillai.
3 vedhavaakkiyam Enna Sollugiradhu? Aabiragaam Dhevanai Visuvaasiththaan, Adhu Avanukku Needhiyaaga Ennappattadhu Endru Sollugiradhu.
4 kiriyai Seygiravanukku Varugira Kooli Kirubaiyendrennappadaamal, Kadanendrennappadum.
5 oruvan Kiriyai Seyyaamal Paaviyai Needhimaanaakkugiravaridaththil Visuvaasam Vaikkiravanaayirundhaal, Avanudaiya Visuvaasame Avanukku Needhiyaaga Ennappadum.
6 andhappadi, Kiriyaigalillaamal Dhevanaale Needhimaanendrennappadugira Manushanudaiya Paakkiyaththaik Kaanbikkum Poruttu;
7 evargaludaiya Akkiramangal Mannikkappattadho, Evargaludaiya Paavangal Moodappattadho, Avargal Baakkiyavaangal.
8 evanudaiya Paavaththaik Karththar Ennaadhirukkiraaro, Avan Baakkiyavaan Endru Thaaveedhu Solliyirukkiraan.
9 indha Baakkiyam Viruththasedhanamullavanukkumaaththiram Varumo, Viruththasedhanamillaadhavanukkum Varumo? Aabiragaamukku Visuvaasam Needhiyaaga Ennappattadhu Endru Sollugirome.

10 adhu Eppozhudhu Avanukku Appadi Ennappattadhu? Avan Viruththasedhanamullavanaayirundhapodho, Viruththasedhanamillaadhavanaayirundhapodho? Viruththasedhanamullavanaayirundhapodhalla, Viruththasedhanamillaadhavanaayirundhapodhe.

11 melum, Viruththasedhanamillaadhakaalaththil Avan Visuvaasaththinaale Adaindha Needhikku Muththiraiyaaga Viruththasedhanamaagiya Adaiyaalaththaip Petraan. Viruththasedhanamillaadhavargalaai Visuvaasikkira Yaavarukkum Needhi Ennappadumporuttaaga Avargalukku Avan Thagappanaayirukkumpadikkum,

12 viruththasedhanaththaip Petravargalaaimaaththiramalla, Nammudaiya Thagappanaagiya Aabiragaam Viruththasedhanamillaadhakaalaththil Adaindha Visuvaasamaagiya Adichsuvadugalil Nadakkiravargalaayumirukkiravargalukkuth Thagappanaayirukkumpadikkum, Andha Adaiyaalaththaip Petraan.

13 andriyum, Ulagaththaich Sudhandharippaan Engira Vaakkuththaththam Aabiragaamukkaavadhu Avan Sandhadhikkaavadhu Niyaayappiramaanaththinaal Kidaiyaamal Visuvaasaththinaal Varugira Needhiyinaal Kidaiththadhu.
14 niyaayappiramaanaththaich Saarndhavargal Sudhandharavaaligalaanaal Visuvaasam Veenaaipom, Vaakkuththaththamum Avamaagum.
15 melum Niyaayappiramaanam Kobaakkinaiyai Undaakkugiradhu, Niyaayappiramaanamillaavittaal Meerudhalumillai.

16 aadhalaal, Sudhandharamaanadhu Kirubaiyinaal Undaagiradhaayirukkumpadikku Adhu Visuvaasaththinaale Varugiradhu; Niyaayappiramaanaththaich Saarndhavargalaagiya Sandhadhiyaarukkumaaththiramalla, Nammellaarukkum Thagappanaagiya Aabiragaamudaiya Visuvaasaththai Saarndhavargalaana Ellaa Sandhadhiyaarukkum Andha Vaakkuththaththam Nichchayamaayirukkumpadikku Appadi Varugiradhu.

17 anega Jaadhigalukku Unnaith Thagappanaaga Erpaduththinen Endru Ezhudhiyirukkirapadi, Avan Thaan Visuvaasiththavarumaai, Mariththorai Uyirppiththu, Illaadhavaigalai Irukkiravaigalaippol Azhaikkiravarumaayirukkira Dhevanukku Munbaaga Nammellaarukkum Thagappanaanaan.
18 un Sandhadhi Ivvalavaayirukkum Endru Sollappattapadiye, Thaan Anega Jaadhigalukkuth Thagappanaavadhai Nambugiradharku Edhuvillaadhirundhum, Adhai Nambikkaiyode Visuvaasiththaan.
19 avan Visuvaasaththile Balaveenamaayirukkavillai; Avan Erakkuraiya Nooru Vayadhullavanaayirukkumbodhu, Than Sareeram Seththupponadhaiyum, Saaraaludaiya Karppam Seththupponadhaiyum Ennaadhirundhaan.
20 dhevanudaiya Vaakkuththaththaththaik Kuriththu Avan Avisuvaasamaai Sandhegappadaamal,
21 dhevan Vaakkuththaththampanninadhai Niraivetra Vallavaraayirukkiraarendru Muzhu Nichchayamaai Nambi, Dhevanai Magimaippaduththi, Visuvaasaththil Vallavanaanaan.
22 aagaiyaal Adhu Avanukku Needhiyaaga Ennappattadhu.
23 adhu Avanukku Needhiyaaga Ennappattadhenbadhu, Avanukkumaaththiramalla, Namakkaagavum Ezhudhappattirukkiradhu.
24 nammudaiya Karththaraagiya Yesuvai Mariththorilirundhu Ezhuppinavarai Visuvaasikkira Namakkum Appadiye Ennappadum.
25 avar Nammudaiya Paavangalukkaaga Oppukkodukkappattum, Naam Needhimaangalaakkappaduvadharkaaga Ezhuppappattum Irukkiraar.
